name: github-copilot
title: GitHub Copilot
description: Delegate tasks to GitHub Copilot coding agent and track progress from Raycast
author: timrogers

preferences.name: copilotAppsJsonPath
preferences.title: Copilot Apps.json Path
preferences.description: Path to GitHub Copilot's apps.json file (auto-generated when you sign in to Copilot via an IDE extension). Defaults to ~/.config/github-copilot/apps.json

commands.name: create-task
commands.title: Create Task
commands.subtitle: GitHub Copilot
commands.description: Delegate a task to Copilot coding agent to work on in the background

commands.name: copilot-usage
commands.title: Copilot Usage
commands.subtitle: GitHub Copilot
commands.description: View your remaining GitHub Copilot usage

commands.name: github-copilot-tasks
commands.title: Menu Bar Tasks
commands.subtitle: GitHub Copilot
commands.description: Track Copilot coding agent tasks from the menu bar

tools.name: create-task
tools.title: Create GitHub Copilot Task
tools.description: Creates a GitHub Copilot coding task with a prompt, repository, and optional branch. If no branch is provided, uses the default branch of the repository.

tools.name: search-repositories
tools.title: Search GitHub Repositories
tools.description: Searches for GitHub repositories. Can search recent repositories, repositories by owner, or use a query filter to find repositories.
